overview: A musical journey hand in hand with some of the great composers of the vallenato region. What is Vallenato? Where was it born? What is the vallenato triphony? What were the so-called juglares? What is the role of women in vallenato? Is it true that "Cien años de soledad" is a vallenato? What is the future of vallenato?
title: Leyenda Viva
